title: Good luck playing jhin
body: As in, its not gonna happen, he is the most op champ that riot has every made, he is gonna be perma banned in all game modes, the lcs, even 3v3 until they gut him, then he'll be fun to play. Unless you want to try your luck at all the instalockers in blind pick that will keep his win rate at 50 because there will be one in every game until 6.3
